staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100001: People always ask me to do things for them...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100003: Sometimes it's hard to get everything done on time...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100004: I wish ^c:1486b0;{0-tomboy_name}^c:pop; would be a bit less rowdy...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100005: She makes such a racket whenever she's about the town.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100007: It's so nice not to have any rowdy people in town!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100008: I can lie in the grass and read a book without being disturbed.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100009: If I say I'll do something, nothing will stop me from getting it done.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100010: There are few things worse than being unreliable.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100011: I'd love to go out and see more of the world.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100012: I don't really have the time for it though.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100013: Even if I did, I'm not sure I'd be able to brave it alone!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100014: It might not seem like it at first, but I actually really enjoy a good chat.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100015: I think most of us here in the village do!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100016: Get to know people a bit better and I'm sure they'll start to open up to you.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100017: It can be pretty hard to be spontaneous with people you've only just met.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100018: I prefer to think carefully about what I want to say.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100019: Plan ahead so that I don't say anything stupid, you know?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100020: Just the other day I was strolling through the forest...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100021: I like spending some time in the nature sometimes, see...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100022: But then there was this terrifying moaning.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100023: I haven't been able to work up the courage to go back since...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100024: Hmm, you want to know a bit more about the island's ^c:1486b0;butterflies^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100025: Well I suppose there are a fair number of varieties. You've most likely seen the common ones already.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100026: Amongst the rare we have ^c:1486b0;monarch butterflies^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;zebra butterflies^c:pop;.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100027: I think there were ^c:1486b0;emperor butterflies^c:pop; around here too.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100028: There could be more, but I think those are the important ones.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100030: How can I help you today?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100032: I'm not sure what I did to deserve this, but please convey my thanks!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100033: I wonder if she's been getting the wrong idea about something...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100039: Thank you, but it's not really the best time...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100040: ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! You have no idea how glad I am to see you!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100041: I was worried ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; would be the one to come by with her...^c:1486b0;monster^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100042: Believe it or not, I do know someone who might be interested...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100043: ^c:1486b0;One of my sisters^c:pop; happens to have a soft spot for...unusual pets...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100044: If you could get this ^c:d03e37;letter^c:pop; to one of the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop;, they can pass it on.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100045: They travel around the world a lot after all.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100046: ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; is asking if the store is ready to cope with the increase in demand?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100047: I think...he's probably overestimating how popular this event is going to be...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100048: But tell him I said yes. I don't see any problems.
Ah ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, you must have received my letter yes?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100050: Things have been a bit blue around here lately...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100051: It's been a long time since I was last able to contact my family back in the ^c:1486b0;woodlands^c:pop;.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100052: Even if ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop; managed to get us connected to the postal service...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100053: There still isn't a good way to send post to other people...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100054: I've been thinking for a while that I could open up a small ^c:1486b0;post office^c:pop; in this ^c:1486b0;shop^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100055: But I'm not sure we'd be able to accommodate it right now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100056: Nor do I have agreement from the local ^c:1486b0;postmen^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100060: Really? You'd be willing to do that for me?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100062: I suppose the first step would be to expand the ^c:1486b0;shop^c:pop; a bit...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100063: We need a ^c:d03e37;counter^c:pop; for handling post and a ^c:d03e37;postbox^c:pop; at least...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100064: I think this should help you get started!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100065: Really, thank you for agreeing to help me, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100066: Normally I have to do everything myself around here...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100069: Now if we could just find a couple of ^c:1486b0;reliable postmen^c:pop;...
I'd try asking some of the Murmur merchants by the town square.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100070: The Murmurs tend to travel, so they know a lot of people!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100071: Have you heard anything about ^c:1486b0;reliable postmen^c:pop; yet?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100072: We'll need a couple of them to agree to our proposal before we can actually start sending post...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100073: Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I had a couple of ^c:1486b0;postmen^c:pop; pass through!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100074: It looks like we're all set for post collection!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100075: Now we just need someone to send the first letter!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100076: This isn't quite enough to compensate you for everything you've done...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100077: So how about this: come by any time you like and you can send post completely free!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100078: You just need to use the ^c:d03e37;counter^c:pop; over there and it should be pretty simple!
And now that we’ve got expanded shipping capabilities, I bet we could start using that new service...
^c:1486b0;Honey.Comb^c:pop;, that’s it! It’s great for ordering products and selling items right from your farm!
I’ll get the ^c:1486b0;Catalogue^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Shipping Station^c:pop; in stock soon, keep an eye out for it.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100079: Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. Here to post a letter?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100080: There's someone here to see you.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100083: Who is it? You didn't get a name?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100084: What did they look like? A bit robotic?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100085: What did she want? She wanted me to come back, didn't she?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100087: As much as I'd like to, I have other responsibilities now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100088: I can't just forget about them and run off into the woodlands...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100089: Things are not so simple. Please let her know that.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100090: You know where the ^c:d03e37;counter^c:pop; is then!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100091: I think you might be the only person actively sending anything these days...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100095: I was beginning to think no one was coming!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100096: I shudder to think what might happen if no one is around to watch the store...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100099: This is just my home village. Maybe you ran into my sisters while you were here?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100100: So did you bring a way for us to escape?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100102: You came in here with no way out? So we're both stuck now?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100103: Well this is a bit unfortunate...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100104: How was the store when you were last there?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100108: ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, perhaps you could give us a moment?
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100109: Thank you for coming all the way out here for me. I didn't expect anyone to go so far.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100110: But it looks like I still have a few more things to deal with first.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100111: I'll make my own way back once I'm done here.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100112: The ^c:1486b0;Tavern^c:pop; has been a bit lonely of late...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100113: So if you feel like you want a roomie, I probably wouldn't say no...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100114: But we can talk about that later. There will be plenty of time.
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100118: I got a weird feeling this morning...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100119: Like most other mornings, I was just rearranging the store items...
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100120: But when I turned my back for a bit, some of the items went missing!
staxel.village.dialogue.Meek.line:100121: I might have been daydreaming... but that does make me anxious.
